scalingStrategy.month3: Focus on building customer base through quality work and word-of-mouth referrals. Aim for 20+ regular customers.
scalingStrategy.month6: Expand services to include designer alterations and custom clothing. Consider hiring part-time help.
scalingStrategy.month12: Open a small shop or expand home setup. Target 50+ regular customers and explore bulk orders from boutiques.

scalingStrategy.month3: Establish consistent quality and delivery schedule. Build customer base of 30-50 regular tiffin customers.
scalingStrategy.month6: Expand menu options and consider catering small events. Hire part-time help for food preparation.
scalingStrategy.month12: Scale to 150+ daily customers or expand into packaged food products for retail sale.

scalingStrategy.month3: Perfect craft techniques and build online presence. Target 30+ items sold monthly through online platforms.
scalingStrategy.month6: Participate in craft fairs and exhibitions. Develop signature product line and consider bulk orders.
scalingStrategy.month12: Establish wholesale relationships with retailers. Scale production to 100+ items monthly with help.

scalingStrategy.month3: Build reputation through student results. Aim for 15-20 regular students across different subjects.
scalingStrategy.month6: Expand to group classes and online tutoring. Consider specialized courses for competitive exams.
scalingStrategy.month12: Establish tutoring center or hire additional tutors. Target 50+ students with diverse course offerings.

scalingStrategy.month3: Build client base through quality services and social media presence. Target 50+ regular clients.
scalingStrategy.month6: Expand service menu and consider mobile beauty services. Build bridal makeup portfolio.
scalingStrategy.month12: Open salon space or hire additional beauticians. Target 200+ services monthly with premium pricing.

scalingStrategy.month3: Establish online presence and initial product line. Target 100+ monthly visitors and 20+ sales.
scalingStrategy.month6: Expand product range and implement digital marketing strategies. Aim for 500+ monthly visitors.
scalingStrategy.month12: Scale to multiple sales channels and consider automation. Target ₹50,000+ monthly revenue.

scalingStrategy.month3: Establish consistent operations and build local customer base. Target 200+ weekly customers.
scalingStrategy.month6: Expand menu and consider delivery partnerships. Hire additional kitchen staff as needed.
scalingStrategy.month12: Scale to multiple locations or expand into catering services. Target 1000+ weekly customers.

scalingStrategy.month3: Curate initial inventory and establish supplier relationships. Target 100+ items sold monthly.
scalingStrategy.month6: Expand product range and build customer loyalty programs. Focus on seasonal collections.
scalingStrategy.month12: Consider second location or online expansion. Target 300+ items monthly with higher margins.

scalingStrategy.month3: Establish safety protocols and build trust with parents. Target 15-20 enrolled children.
scalingStrategy.month6: Expand age groups and add educational programs. Consider extended hours services.
scalingStrategy.month12: Scale to full capacity (30-40 children) and consider additional locations or services.

scalingStrategy.month3: Build vendor network and complete first few events successfully. Target 3-5 events monthly.
scalingStrategy.month6: Specialize in specific event types and build reputation. Aim for 5-8 events monthly.
scalingStrategy.month12: Expand team and handle larger events. Target 10+ events monthly with higher value contracts.

scalingStrategy.month3: Perfect techniques and build initial collection. Target 25+ pieces sold monthly.
scalingStrategy.month6: Expand to custom orders and participate in exhibitions. Build online presence.
scalingStrategy.month12: Establish wholesale relationships and scale production. Target 80+ pieces monthly.

scalingStrategy.month3: Build portfolio and establish pricing structure. Target 10-15 shoots monthly.
scalingStrategy.month6: Specialize in specific photography types and build client base. Aim for 15-25 shoots monthly.
scalingStrategy.month12: Expand services and consider hiring assistants. Target 25+ shoots monthly with premium pricing.

scalingStrategy.month3: Establish efficient processes and build reputation. Target 6-8 events monthly.
scalingStrategy.month6: Expand menu options and team size. Build relationships with event planners.
scalingStrategy.month12: Scale to larger events and multiple simultaneous bookings. Target 15+ events monthly.

scalingStrategy.month3: Perfect recipes and build local customer base. Target 50+ items monthly.
scalingStrategy.month6: Expand product range and consider custom orders. Build online presence.
scalingStrategy.month12: Scale production and consider retail partnerships. Target 150+ items monthly.

scalingStrategy.month3: Build expertise and establish credibility. Target 8-10 clients monthly.
scalingStrategy.month6: Develop specialized services and increase rates. Build thought leadership.
scalingStrategy.month12: Scale through partnerships or team expansion. Target 15+ clients with premium pricing.
